identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a visceral, high-stakes cyberpunk typing battle arena that feels like a terminal in a dystopian future.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Arcade Fighting Games (Street Fighter) with Developer Tools (VS Code).
Emotion First: Every keystroke must feel lethal. Typing is combat.
Content is King: The text to type is the battlefield. It must be legible but stylized.
Zoom In: Focus on the current word. Blur the rest.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make neon pop.

usage.headings: Orbitron (Bold/Black) - Uppercase, tracking-widest. Use for 'VS', 'KO', Ranks.
usage.typing_area: JetBrains Mono (Bold) - The actual game text. No ligatures for clarity.

layout_strategies.lobby: Mode A: The Tetris Grid. Asymmetric bento box. Hero section for 'Play Ranked', smaller boxes for 'Stats', 'Leaderboard'.
layout_strategies.battle_arena: Split View HUD. Player Left (Blue/Cyan), Opponent Right (Red/Pink). Center: The Text Stream. Top: Timer (Digital Clock). Bottom: Health Bars.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for containers. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-orbitron uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.6)] transition-all clip-path-polygon
buttons.secondary: border border-primary/50 text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 font-rajdhani uppercase tracking-wide

cards.base: bg-surface/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-none relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-b-2 border-white/20 focus:border-primary outline-none font-mono text-lg p-4 placeholder:text-white/20

health_bar.container: h-4 w-full bg-white/5 skew-x-[-15deg] overflow-hidden border border-white/10
health_bar.fill: h-full transition-all duration-300 ease-out skew-x-[15deg] origin-left

motion.projectile: CSS animation moving from Player Avatar to Opponent Avatar. Trail effect required.
motion.ko: Slow motion (timeScale: 0.2) + Grayscale filter + Chromatic Aberration.

backgrounds.description: Main Menu Background - Dark Neon City
Battle Arena Background - Abstract Neon Structure

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Immediately update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors (primary, secondary, accent) and fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani).
2. GLOBAL CSS: In 'index.css', add the @import for Google Fonts and set the body background to #020204. Add a '.scanlines' utility class.

3. SHADCN OVERRIDE: Do not use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'glassmorphism' and 'tech_border' styles defined above. Remove rounded corners (rounded-none) for a sharper cyberpunk look.
4. BATTLE HUD: Create a dedicated 'BattleHUD' component. It must be absolute positioned over the background. Use z-index to layer: Background < Particles < HUD < Modals.
5. TYPING ENGINE: The typing input must be invisible (opacity-0 absolute input) but focus kept. Render the text visually using spans. CorrectWrongPending.
6. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for the health bars and damage numbers. Use CSS keyframes for the 'glitch' effect on the opponent's avatar when hit.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to the hidden input field ('battle-input'), the timer ('battle-timer'), and the health bars ('player-hp', 'opponent-hp').

do_not: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large header.
Do not use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Cyberpunk is sharp.
Do not use white backgrounds anywhere.
must_do: Ensure contrast ratio is high (Neon on Black is usually good, but check grey text).
Add sound effects (optional but recommended for 'click' and 'error').
